comments.body: This is incorrect. What is exported is not a `JsonLdProcessor`-typed value, but a `JsonLdProcessor` class: https://github.com/digitalbazaar/jsonld.js/blob/master/lib/JsonLdProcessor.js#L7

The class is just having the 3 static functions "expand", "flatten" and "compact". If I use a class instead of an interface the linter is complaining about that the class has only static properties. In my opinion it is correct to use the interface here. I have added an according section to the test file, to test if it is working.
Should I change something anyway or can I mark it as resolved?
`frame` is object or string, not object or array of objects or string (https://www.w3.org/TR/json-ld11-framing/#jsonldprocessor)
